# ePayout Payment Instructions

ePayout allows you to get money faster and have it transferred to your bank account directly without hassle.

# Payment Instructions (Only applicable to Individual Products)

Notes:

- e-Payout is only applicable to policyowner's bank account, except joint account.
- Default e-Payout Method will be applied if any if no option is specified or the specified option is invalid.

# By e-Payout:

1. Default e-Payout Method (i.e. last channel for receiving claims payment or policy payment through FPS/Direct Credit, If this option is selected without prior default arrangement, we will pay according to option b() below if applicable). Otherwise, cheque will be issued.
2. Direct Credit to one of my following bank accounts (up to HKD300,000/USD37,500)

| Current autopay bank account in HKD currency for payment of premium and levy |                  |                                                   |   |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | - |
| Name of account holder                                                       | CHEUNG TAI MAN   |                                                   |   |
| Currency and Bank Name                                                       | HKD Bank Account |                                                   |   |
|                                                                              | Bank Name        | THE HONGKONG AND SHANGHAI BANKING CORPORATION LTD |   |
| Bank No.                                                                     | Branch No.       | Bank Account No.                                  |   |
| 01112                                                                        | 919191           | 112131415161718                                   |   |

Please provide account proof (e.g. bank statement or bank book copy showing the name of account holder and account number).
3. FPS to my default receiving account (in HKD only, up to HKD1,000,000)

Hong Kong Mobile Phone Number: (852)

Others: Country / Region Code & Mobile Phone Number

Remarks:

- The above specified Faster Payment System (FPS) mobile phone number is for FPS payment only and will not be updated to your contact information in our record.

For payout through FPS, only applicable to payment with maximum daily transaction limit not exceeding HKD1,000,000 (or equivalent) per policy. If payment is exceeding HKD1,000,000 (or equivalent) or above, or the instruction cannot be executed, it will be issued by cheque and collected by Insurance Advisor.

For payout through Direct Credit, only applicable to payment with maximum daily transaction limit not exceeding HKD300,000/USD37,500 per policy. If payment is exceeding HKD300,000/USD37,500 or above, or the instruction cannot be executed, it will be issued by cheque and collected by Insurance Advisor.

The above instruction will replace the existing default e-Payout method (if any). If there is no default e-Payout method set in our record, it will be issued by cheque.

# Cheque collection method

- Through my Insurance Advisor
- By mail to my latest correspondence address with Manulife
- Pick up in Customer Service Centre
- By Other Payment Option available for claims payment - Please provide details in page 1 section of "Other Information / Special Request"

# Notes:

- (a) Unless request to the contrary is specifically made, the claim reimbursement cheque will be drawn in HKD for Hong Kong policies and MOP for Macao policies. The cheque will be forwarded to the Policyowner with the Payment Advice after approval of the claim.
- (b) For policy in non-HKD currency, its HKD equivalent will be based on the currency exchange rate provided by the Company at the time of issue of the cheque and it can be changed from time to time.
- (c) In general, it takes a longer settlement period to clear a foreign cheque in Hong Kong. Bank charges may be incurred by client for clearing the cheque.
